document_data.name: Thaerlune
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaerlune''' was an inhabitant of [[Ripplestones]] during the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: During the {{yearlinkName|767}}, Thaerlune was mentioned at a tavern in [[Ripplestones]] as part of a discussion about [[Saeraede Lyonora|The Slayer]], a strange entity that was devouring all life near the town. It was brought up that Thaerlune had picked up and moved elsewhere, after claiming he was visiting his sister, who was too sick.
